Sentencas: This paper analyzes the thermodynamic and electrochemical dynamic performance of an anode supported micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) fed by different types of fuel.
Titulo: Experimental analysis of performance degradation of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells fed by different fuel mixtures

Sentencas: The micro-tubular SOFC used is anode supported, consisting of a NiO and Gd0.2Ce0.8O2-x(GDC) cermet anode, thin GDC electrolyte, and a La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-y (LSCF) and GDC cermet cathode.
Titulo: Experimental analysis of performance degradation of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells fed by different fuel mixtures

Sentencas: The fabrication of the cells under investigation is briefly summarized, with emphasis on the innovations with respect to traditional techniques.
Titulo: Experimental analysis of performance degradation of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells fed by different fuel mixtures

Sentencas: Such micro-tubular cells were tested using a Test Stand consisting of: a vertical tubular furnace, an electrical load, a galvanostast, a bubbler, gas pipelines, temperature, pressure and flow meters.
Titulo: Experimental analysis of performance degradation of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells fed by different fuel mixtures

Sentencas: The tests on the micro-SOFC were performed using H-2, CO, CH4 and H2O in different combinations at 550 degrees C, to determine the cell polarization curves under several load cycles.
Titulo: Experimental analysis of performance degradation of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells fed by different fuel mixtures

Sentencas: Long-term experimental tests were also performed in order to assess degradation of the electrochemical performance of the cell.
Titulo: Experimental analysis of performance degradation of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells fed by different fuel mixtures

Sentencas: Results of the tests were analyzed aiming at determining the sources of the cell performance degradation.
Titulo: Experimental analysis of performance degradation of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells fed by different fuel mixtures

Sentencas: Authors concluded that the cell under investigation is particularly sensitive to the carbon deposition which significantly reduces cell performance, after few cycles, when fed by light hydrocarbons.
Titulo: Experimental analysis of performance degradation of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells fed by different fuel mixtures

Sentencas: A significant performance degradation is also detected when hydrogen is used as fuel.
Titulo: Experimental analysis of performance degradation of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells fed by different fuel mixtures

Sentencas: In this case, the authors ascribe the degradation to the micro-cracks, the change in materials crystalline structure and problems with electrical connections.
Titulo: Experimental analysis of performance degradation of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells fed by different fuel mixtures
Experimental analysis of performance degradation of micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells fed by different fuel mixtures
